0.7.name: wordpress/weather-grabber
0.7.description:
This plugin connects to files generated by the WView weather server software (or other software using the supported format and naming conventions) and displays the weather data in wordpress using widgets.

Requirements for pre-1.0 release: - Latest WView weather server software (http://www.wviewweather.com)
